txt.en: To learn about available hobbies visit a hobby master. Hobby masters can be found in many locations including the following towns: Bree-town (Scholar's Stair Archives), Michel Delving (Bird and Baby Inn), Ered Luin (Thorin's Hall), Lhan Garan in Swanfleet (fishing dock), Rivendell (Hall of Fire), Zelem-melek (The Twenty-first Hall).
